resources.string: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.

Espresso with added hot water (100-150 ml). Often served in a cappuccino cup. (The espresso is added into the hot water rather than all the water being flowed through the coffee that would lead to over extraction.)
A tall, mild \'milk coffee\' (about 150-300 ml). An espresso with steamed milk and only a little milk foam poured over it. Serve in a latte glass or a coffee cup. Flavoured syrup can be added.
Has become a global phenomenon, influencing fashion, language, and social movements. It often serves as a voice for marginalized communities
Known for its rebellious spirit and influence on youth culture. Rock concerts and festivals have become major cultural events
Cultivated a dedicated fanbase, with subcultures and festivals celebrating the genre. Metal music often emphasizes technical proficiency and musicianship.
